# thecloud_api_key (Resource)

API Key resource allows you to manage authentication keys.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the API key.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The timestamp when the API key was created.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the API key.
- `key` (String, Sensitive) The actual API key value. Only returned on creation.
